state_manifold.embedding_function: Canonical QA primitives with derived coordinates (d=b+e, a=b+2e).

generators.name: sigma
generators.invariant_effect: Preserves integer manifold; may emit OUT_OF_BOUNDS.

invariants.name: derived_coordinates
invariants.definition: d and a are derived from (b,e) (no independent 4-tuple).

failure_taxonomy.trigger_condition: Attempted σ step exceeds Caps(N,N) boundary.

reachability.component_analysis: DAG under sigma-only; return_in_k decidable via bounded BFS.

determinism_contract.nondeterminism_proof: σ produces exactly one successor state when legal; otherwise a typed FAIL.
